name: NSProtocolChecker
desc: An object that restricts the messages that can be sent to another object (referred to as the checker’s delegate).

items.name: init(target: NSObject, protocol: Protocol)
items.desc: Initializes a newly allocated NSProtocolChecker instance that will forward any messages in aProtocol to anObject, the protocol checker’s target.

items.name: var `protocol`: Protocol
items.desc: Returns the protocol object the receiver uses.

items.name: var target: NSObject?
items.desc: Returns the target of the receiver.
